snippet.title: Banjax (longplay) for the BBC Micro
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Legend has it that any bear who is intelligent enough to reach the Inner Sanctum of the Golden Temple shall become Lord of the Lands of Mystery.

Can you help Banjax become such a bear? 

You have to collect all treasures and avoid monsters to fullfil Banjax's destiny.
